column1: #Text=There are some errors in this column.
#Text=The Permanent Court of Arbitration is a private organization and has nothing to do with the UN.
#Text=The UN has no position on the Philippines vs China case.There is no international consensus on the South China Sea ruling.
#Text=So far only the United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, Philippines, and Vietnam has said the case was binding.

#Text=All other countries have released statements exhorting the importance of UNCLOS and the need for a peaceful settlement.If it comes to military force, then China will crush the Philippines navy in a couple of days.
#Text=The Philippines navy is the weakest in Asia with obsolete boats and little fuel and ammunition.China has continuously called for peaceful negotiation with the Philippines and other countries.
#Text=The new Philippines President, Rodrigo Duterte, seems to want negotiation with China as he wants Chinese investment in infrastructure.
